item.title: How do i make rune claws a sheild?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

Do you mean what you start with? if so look here in the JAVA file named : Player


//Giving the player an unique look
[/code] [code]
		playerEquipment[playerHat]=1053;
		playerEquipment[playerCape]=6570;
		playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585;
		playerEquipment[playerChest]=6107;
		playerEquipment[playerShield]=3122;
		playerEquipment[playerLegs]=6108;
		playerEquipment[playerHands]=6922;
		playerEquipment[playerFeet]=6920;
		playerEquipment[playerRing]=6735;
		playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

Then look up the IDs of what you want and simply change
